## Is it a bird

``` python
from fastbook import *
```

``` python
urls = search_images_ddg('bird photos', max_images=1)
len(urls),urls[0]
```

    (1,

``` python
dest=Path('bird.jpg')
download_url(urls[0],dest)
```
